attributes.action: Increase  all key workers’ wages whilst supporting with COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
The government needs to support this incentive because key workers are sacrificing more than their health to offer support.

They key workers are risking their families, friends and their lives everyday to ensure that the effects of this virus are as minimal as possible.
attributes.background: The government needs to announce the incentives they are willing to offer to the group of workers Categorised as key workers, who are supporting the NHS and other services on the front line in the effort to combat the COVID -19 pandemic.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
